query: mutation($input:CheckCustomEventCreateInput!){checkCustomEventCreate(input: $input){check{category{id,name},description,enabled,filter{connective,htmlUrl,id,name,predicates{key,keyData,type,value}},id,level{alias,description,id,index,name},name,notes,owner{... on Team{alias,contacts{displayName,address},id,manager{name,email},name,responsibilities}},type,... on CustomEventCheck{integration{id,name,type},resultMessage,serviceSelector,successCondition},... on ManualCheck{updateFrequency{startingDate,frequencyTimeScale,frequencyValue},updateRequiresComment},... on RepositoryFileCheck{directorySearch,filePaths,fileContentsPredicate{type,value}},... on RepositorySearchCheck{fileExtensions,fileContentsPredicate{type,value}},... on ServicePropertyCheck{serviceProperty,propertyValuePredicate{type,value}},... on TagDefinedCheck{tagKey,tagPredicate{type,value}},... on ToolUsageCheck{toolCategory,toolNamePredicate{type,value},environmentPredicate{type,value}}},errors{message,path}}}
